short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Namada Keychain manages a user's wallet for the Namada ecosystem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Namada Extension allows users to create new accounts on Namada or import accounts from a recovery phrase or Ledger Hardware Wallet.
